nodes.text: The Highgarden District, or simply Highgarden, was a lightly urbanized district on the planet Troithe. After the New Republic's 61st Mobile Infantry was scattered by the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing around 5 ABY, a remnant of the company formed at a three story speeder garage in the district.
The Highgarden District appeared in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
